mapper.insert: INSERT /*com.deft.crud.admin.board.model.dto.AdminBoardDTO*/ INTO TBL_BOARD B ( B.WRITE_NO , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_NAME , B.EMP_NO , B.WRITE_DATE , B.CONTENTS , B.TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_WRITE_NO.NEXTVAL , 1 , #{ boardName } , #{ empNo } , SYSDATE , #{ contents } , '공지사항' )
mapper.select: SELECT /*com.deft.crud.board.model.dto.BoardDTO*/ LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_WRITE_NO'

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.board.model.dto.BoardDTO*/ B.BOARD_NO , B.WRITE_NO , B.BOARD_NAME , B.CONTENTS FROM TBL_BOARD B JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (E.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = 1 AND B.WRITE_NO = #{ writeNo }
